articles.description: Mr. Wynn, who had been selected for the committee finance position by President Trump, was facing growing calls to step aside.

articles.description: As a series of firings and resignations roiled the first year of the Trump administration, Donald F. McGahn II maintained a low profile, but he has recently been thrust squarely into the public eye.
articles.title: Counsel Quietly Trying to Corral Trump While Pushing G.O.P.’s Agenda

articles.title: Trump liked a tweet about his 'great friend' being accused of sexual misconduct

articles.description: It should come as no shock that President Donald Trump wants NASA to send its astronauts to the moon. Trump revived the National Space Council with Vice President Mike Pence as its head in part to redirect NASA toward sending humans back to the moon for the f…
articles.title: Trump's NASA budget will say goodbye to the Space Station and send us back to the moon

articles.description: Just a few months before President Donald Trump moved into the White House, his presence was already firmly established in downtown Washington, just a few blocks from 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue, at the newly opened Trump International Hotel.

articles.description: President Trump's new 30 percent tariff on imported solar panels could lead to a drop in the solar panel industry, ultimately costing thousands of workers their jobs, according to some reports.

articles.title: 8 times since June the White House denied Trump was considering firing Mueller
